text: Marek Seman (born 27 February 1976) is a Slovak football defender who currently plays for TJ Rozvoj Pušovce. His former club was Partizán Bardejov. ==External links== *at fotbal.idnes.cz *at eurofotbal.cz ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:AS Trenčín players Category:1.
